channel.title: Yell help

item.title: Yell help
item.dc:creator: @pk4agirl pk4agirl
item.description:
@pk4agirl wrote:

[quote=“KempiScape, post:2, topic:510013”]replace it with

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
if (Connection.isMuted©) {
c.sendMessage(“You are muted and cannot yell.”);
return;
}
for (int j = 0; j < PlayerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (PlayerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[j];
if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) {
c2.sendMessage("<shad=15007744><img=2>[Co-Owner]<img=2><shad=16711680>"
+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)
+ ": "
+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))
+ “”);

                                            /**
                                             * }else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")){
                                             * c2.sendMessage
                                             * ("<shad=13989119><img=2>[Web Designer]</col><img=2>"+
                                             * Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " +
                                             * Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                             * }else if
                                             * (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("revolution")){
                                             * c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Head Mod]</col><img=1>"+
                                             * Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " +
                                             * Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                             * }else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("limey")){
                                             * c2.sendMessage(
                                             * "<col=255>[Trial Moderator]</col><img=1>"+
                                             * Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " +
                                             * Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                             * }else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")){
                                             * c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Noah]</col><img=3>"+
                                             * Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " +
                                             * Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                             **/
                                   } else if (c.playerRights == 0) {
                                            c2.sendMessage("[Player]"
                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + ": "
                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))
                                                            + "");
                                    } else if (c.playerRights == 1) {
                                            c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]</col><img=0>"
                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + ": "
                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))
                                                            + "");
                                    } else if (c.playerRights == 2) {

                                            c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Super Donator]</col><img=1>"
                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)
                                                            + ": "
                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))
                                                            + "");
                                    } else if (c.playerRights == 4) {
                                            c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134><img=2>[Extreme Donator]</col><img=2>"
                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)
                                                            + ": "
                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))
                                                            + "");
                                    } else if (c.playerRights == 5) {
                                            c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Moderator]</col><img=4>"
                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + ": "
                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))
                                                            + "");
                                    } else if (c.playerRights == 7) {
                                            c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Adminstrator]</col><img=6>"
                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + ": "
                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))
                                                            + "");
                                    } else if (c.playerRights == 8) {
                                            c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Head-Administrator]</col><img=7>"
                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)
                                                            + ": "
                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))
                                                            + "");
                                    } else if (c.playerRights == 9) {
                                            c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Gfx Artist]</col><img=8>"
                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + ": "
                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))
                                                            + "");
                                    } else if (c.playerRights == 10) {
                                            c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Vetarn]</col><img=9>"
                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + ": "
                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))
                                                            + "");
                                    } else if (c.playerRights == 11) {
                                            c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415><img=10>[Owner of insomnia]</col><img=10>"
                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)
                                                            + ": "
                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))
                                                            + "");
                                    } else if (c.playerRights == 6) {
                                            c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Head-Moderator]</col><img=5>"
                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + ": "
                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))
                                                            + "");
                                    }
                            }
                    }
            }

    }[/code]

i want you to learn something so figure out what the difference is
hf[/quote]
thanks bro

Read full topic

item.title: Yell help
item.dc:creator: @Aetoc Aetoc
item.description:
@Aetoc wrote:

He won’t spot the difference i bet.

SPOILER: Added another else if statement to support normal player rights, which is 0 and set the title when they yell to Player.

item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

replace it with

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
if (Connection.isMuted©) {
c.sendMessage(“You are muted and cannot yell.”);
return;
}
for (int j = 0; j < PlayerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (PlayerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[j];
if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) {
c2.sendMessage("<shad=15007744><img=2>[Co-Owner]<img=2><shad=16711680>"
+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)
+ ": "
+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))
+ “”);

                                            /**

                                             * c2.sendMessage

                                   } else if (c.playerRights == 0) {
                                            c2.sendMessage("[Player]"
                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + ": "

                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)

                                    } else if (c.playerRights == 5) {

item.title: Yell help
item.dc:creator: @pk4agirl pk4agirl
item.description:
@pk4agirl wrote:

how i can make all players can yell not only donor here its my code of yell

[code=javascript]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
if (Connection.isMuted©) {
c.sendMessage(“You are muted and cannot yell.”);
return;
}
for (int j = 0; j < PlayerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (PlayerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[j];
if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) {
c2.sendMessage("<shad=15007744><img=2>[Co-Owner]<img=2><shad=16711680>"
+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)
+ ": "
+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))
+ “”);

					/**
					 * }else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")){
					 * c2.sendMessage
					 * ("<shad=13989119><img=2>[Web Designer]</col><img=2>"+
					 * Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " +
					 * Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
					 * }else if
					 * (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("revolution")){
					 * c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Head Mod]</col><img=1>"+
					 * Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " +
					 * Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
					 * }else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("limey")){
					 * c2.sendMessage(
					 * "<col=255>[Trial Moderator]</col><img=1>"+
					 * Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " +
					 * Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
					 * }else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")){
					 * c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Noah]</col><img=3>"+
					 * Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " +
					 * Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
					 **/
				} else if (c.playerRights == 1) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]</col><img=0>"
							+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + ": "
							+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))
							+ "");
				} else if (c.playerRights == 2) {

					c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Super Donator]</col><img=1>"
							+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)
							+ ": "
							+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))
							+ "");
				} else if (c.playerRights == 4) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134><img=2>[Extreme Donator]</col><img=2>"
							+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)
							+ ": "
							+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))
							+ "");
				} else if (c.playerRights == 5) {
					c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Moderator]</col><img=4>"
							+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + ": "
							+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))
							+ "");
				} else if (c.playerRights == 7) {
					c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Adminstrator]</col><img=6>"
							+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + ": "
							+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))
							+ "");
				} else if (c.playerRights == 8) {
					c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Head-Administrator]</col><img=7>"
							+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)
							+ ": "
							+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))
							+ "");
				} else if (c.playerRights == 9) {
					c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Gfx Artist]</col><img=8>"
							+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + ": "
							+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))
							+ "");
				} else if (c.playerRights == 10) {
					c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Vetarn]</col><img=9>"
							+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + ": "
							+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))
							+ "");
				} else if (c.playerRights == 11) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415><img=10>[Owner of insomnia]</col><img=10>"
							+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)
							+ ": "
							+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))
							+ "");
				} else if (c.playerRights == 6) {
					c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Head-Moderator]</col><img=5>"
							+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + ": "
							+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))
							+ "");
				}
			}
		}
	}

}[/code]
